Head: Gastric
Salty taste to all cereals
Appetite increased
Tongue coated, FOUL TASTE
Light, yellow, narrow, VERY OFFENSIVE stool
Frequent, scanty, burning, difficult
Frontal headache, worse over left eye, in the evening, BETTER BY SHORT STEP
BELCHING
Intestinal dyspepsia
Urinary Organs
Mind: Lack of concentration; impossible to study; DESPONDENT; desire to be with people
Sleep: Increased desire to sleep; wakes unrefreshed, half doped feeling

details: Represents the ultimate end of protein decomposition and is a constituent of human feces.Acne with auto-intoxication dependent upon intestinal decomposition. Stomach and abdominal symptoms and frontal headache. Sluggishness with no ambition. Desire to curse and swear.
name: Skatol
